Uses of Class
com.joliciel.talismane.AnnotatedText

  • Packages that use AnnotatedText 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane
    Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.rawText
    Package managing the initial filtering of an input stream, such as in the case of XML analysis, where the XML tags need to be removed, and in some case represent sentence breaks.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector
    Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.

    • Uses of AnnotatedText in com.joliciel.talismane

      Classes in com.joliciel.talismane with type parameters of type AnnotatedText 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Annotator<T extends AnnotatedText>
      Implemented by classes which take an annotated text and add zero or more annotations.
      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane with parameters of type AnnotatedText 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends java.io.Serializable>
      void      		 AnnotationObserver.afterAddAnnotations(AnnotatedText subject) 
      <T extends java.io.Serializable>
      void      		 AnnotationObserver.beforeAddAnnotations(AnnotatedText subject, java.util.List<Annotation<T>> annotations)
      An event fired whenever annotations are added to the observed subject.

    • Uses of AnnotatedText in com.joliciel.talismane.rawText

      Subclasses of AnnotatedText in com.joliciel.talismane.rawText 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RawText
      An annotated text which can be filtered and sentence-detected, after which we can retrieve the resulting sentences.
      class  RawTextProcessor
      A class capable of processing a set of RawTextFilters so that a list of sentences can be extracted.
      class  RollingTextBlock
      A block of raw text, always containing four sub-blocks, which are rolled in from right to left.
      class  Sentence
      A sentence detected by the sentence detector, including information about the original location of the sentence in the stream being processed, and about any text in the original stream that has been marked for raw inclusion in Talismane's output.
      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.rawText that return AnnotatedText 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AnnotatedText RawTextProcessor.getProcessedText()
      Return processed text ready for sentence detection.
      AnnotatedText RollingTextBlock.getRawTextBlock()
      Get a raw text block for annotation by filters.
      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.rawText with parameters of type AnnotatedText 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RawTextRegexAnnotator.annotate(AnnotatedText textBlock, java.lang.String... labels) 

    • Uses of AnnotatedText in com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector

      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector with parameters of type AnnotatedText 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SentenceDetector.annotate(AnnotatedText annotatedText, java.lang.String... labels) 
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> SentenceDetector.detectSentences(AnnotatedText text, java.lang.String... labels)
      Detect sentences within an annotated text.
